title: Impact of bond sales on MS, interest rate and AD

content.question: When a central bank conducts open-market bond sales in a banking system with limited reserves, the money supply, interest rate, and aggregate demand will change in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label:
Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Decrease
 Increase
 Decrease

Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Decrease
 Decrease
 Increase

Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Decrease
 Increase
 Increase

Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Increase
 Decrease
 Increase

Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Increase
 Decrease
 Decrease

content.answer:
Money Supply
 Interest Rate
 Aggregate Demand

Decrease
 Increase
 Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
